channel.title: Crash after airstrike in Surface Tension
channel.description: Right, so I just blew up the Gargantua with an airstrike, causing the Gargantua to gib. Apparently the gargs arm glitches into something and causes a crash. Attached are a screenshot of the error popup window and the minidump. hl2_4104_crash_2012_10_8T16_50_38C0.mdmp (102 KB) ![BMScrash.jpg|499x206](upload://xectVb1aAKp1lnUbRv7V3EZBQKg.jpeg)

item.title: Crash after airstrike in Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: mini_bunney
item.description:
Well the crash only occurs when the garg blows up in a specific spot, so yes, earlier saves work. Just wanted to report that this kind of crash is possible and quite easy to accomplish

Read full topic
item.source: Crash after airstrike in Surface Tension

item.title: Crash after airstrike in Surface Tension
item.dc:creator: Jenova19
item.description:
Have you tried re-loading from an earlier save (from before the current map, at best) or just re-starting the game?

Read full topic
